sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
near a place or thing
ali
near to it
, je nedaleč od nekega kraja ali predmeta.

seg.quote: I wish I lived nearer London.
He pulled her nearer to him.
I looked at the books nearest to where I stood.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
near a particular state
ali
near to it
, je določeno stanje že skoraj dosegel.

seg.quote: Her father was angry, her mother near tears.
I was very near to giving in to their demands.

sense.def:
Kadar sta si stvari podobni, lahko rečemo, da sta
near each other
ali
near to each other
.

seg.quote: Most views were fairly near the truth.
He is the nearest we have to an English Leonardo da Vinci.

sense.def:
One's near relatives
so najožji sorodniki nekega človeka, na primer starši in stari starši.

Kadar se nekaj zgodi
near a particular time
ali
near to it
, se zgodi tik pred tistim časom ali tik zatem.

Kadar je čas ali dogodek
near
, se bo zgodil zelo kmalu.

Izraz
near
lahko pomeni tudi, da nekaj skoraj ima določeno lastnost ali se skoraj zgodi.

Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
is nearing a particular place, stage, or point in time
, se določenemu kraju, stopnji ali času približuje.

seg.quote: As they neared the harbour, it began to rain.

sense.def:
Izraza
near enough
in
as near as makes no difference
pomenita, da je nekaj skoraj res;

seg.quote: He paid £100, or as near as makes no difference.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a near thing
, se skoraj konča z nesrečo ali katastrofo.

seg.quote: I lived—but it was a near thing.
